Our next session will be on installing and using Jupyter. Led by Chris Holden this session will cover what Jupyter is, how to install it, and how to use it. Join us October 22, 2015 in STO 442 from 5:00-6:00.

If you’re interested in coding in Python, R, Ruby, or any of the other 40 languages supported by Jupyter - you’ll want to attend this event. And beginners are welcome!
